articles.title: Important Steps Declared as Regards Kaesong Industrial Zone
articles.content:
Important Steps Declared as Regards Kaesong Industrial Zone
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yang Gon, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, issued the following statement on Monday:
					 The Korean Peninsula has been put in the state of war due to the serious anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. and south Korean authorities and their moves for a nuclear war.
					
					 Not content with escalating military tension together with the U.S., the south Korean conservatives, in particular, are running the whole gamut of intrigues to find a pretext for igniting a war against the DPRK after reducing the Kaesong Industrial Zone to a theatre of confrontation.
					
					 Defying the repeated warnings of the DPRK, the south Korean confrontation maniacs are letting loose a string of invectives hurting the dignity of the DPRK, talking about "source of money", "detention" and "hostages". South Korean Defense Minister Kim Kwan Jin revealed his sinister intention to introduce a special unit of the U.S. forces into the zone, vociferating about an operation for "rescuing hostages".
					
					 This goes to prove that the south Korean warmongers seek to turn the zone into a hotbed of war against the DPRK.
					
					 By origin, the zone was built as a symbol of reconciliation, cooperation and reunification after the DPRK granted a privilege to Jong Ju Yong, honorary chairman of Hyundai Group of south Korea, valuing his patriotic will for reunification.
					
					 The DPRK's offer to south Korean enterprises a vast area near the Military Demarcation Line where armed forces of the north and the south are standing in acute confrontation was a bold decision based on ardent love for the nation and compatriotism and a manifestation of the firm will for independent reunification, peace and prosperity based on the spirit of "By our nation itself" clarified in the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					
					 When traitor Lee Myung Bak did serious harm to the inter-Korean relations in all aspects, getting hell-bent on confrontation after coming to power, the zone remained unaffected by it thanks to the desire and will of all Koreans in the north and the south for reunification and kept its operations for common prosperity.
					
					 But the zone is now in the grip of a serious crisis.
					
					 The zone, a product of the June 15 joint declaration, has been reduced to a theater of confrontation with fellow countrymen and military provocation, quite contrary to its original nature and mission due to such hideous confrontation maniacs as Kim Kwan Jin. This situation can no longer be tolerated.
					
					 The south Korean conservative forces claim that the DPRK will never give up the zone as it benefits from the industrial zone, but it gets few economic benefits from the zone while the south side largely benefits from it. 
					
					 The DPRK provided an area of military strategic importance to the south side, in particular. This meant a big concession. 
					
					 It is a tragedy that the industrial zone which should serve purposes of national reconciliation, unity, peace and reunification has been reduced to a theatre of confrontation between compatriots and war against the north. The existence of such zone is no better than nothing. 
					
					 The DPRK is compelled to make an important decision related to the issue of the industrial zone now that the south Korean authorities abuse the generosity and compatriotism of the DPRK for their hostile purpose. 
					
					 Upon authorization, I declare the following important steps as regards the crisis in the Kaesong Industrial Zone:
					
					1. The DPRK will withdraw all its employees from the zone. 
					
					2. It will temporarily suspend the operations in the zone and examine the issue of whether it will allow its existence or close it as the south Korean authorities and military warmongers seek to turn it into a hotbed of confrontation between compatriots and war against the DPRK, hurting its dignity.
					
					 The General Bureau for Central Guidance to the Development of the Special Zone will be responsible for the working matters related to the important steps including the withdrawal of the employees and the temporary suspension of the operations in the zone. 
					
					 How the situation will develop in the days ahead will entirely depend on the attitude of the south Korean authorities.

articles.title: Kim Yang Gon Visits Kaesong Industrial Zone
articles.content:
Kim Yang Gon Visits Kaesong Industrial Zone
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Yang Gon visited the Kaesong Industrial Zone Monday to size up the situation. Fierce controversy has now emerged over the issue of the Kaesong Industrial Zone blamed on the U.S. and the south Korean conservative authorities' hostile acts against the DPRK and their moves for a war against it.
					 Kim Yang Gon was accompanied by officials concerned of the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea and the General Bureau for Central Guidance to the Development of the Special Zone.
					
					 Kim Yang Gon toured the Kaesong Industrial Zone office of the General Bureau, Kaesong Industrial Zone combined supporting center and other units and production sites inside the zone. He also went to the checkpoint in the zone and the central line separating the north-south road along the Military Demarcation Line. He drew attention to the fate of the zone that has been put at stake as the south Korean conservative authorities aggravated the situation by making remarks slandering the dignity of the DPRK over the zone issue.
					
					 Minister of Defense of south Korea Kim Kwan Jin openly disclosed his scenario to dispatch a special unit of the U.S. forces to the zone, while crying out for an operation for "rescuing hostages". Kim Yang Gon branded the scheme as an intentional provocation to make the zone a starting point of a war.
					
					 He called for maintaining strained and mobilized posture on a high alert with the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers stepping up moves to provoke a war against the DPRK. 
					
					 It has become impossible to operate the zone as usual due to the south Korean warmongers' reckless acts, Kim Yang Gon said. He held a consultative meeting on the spot and entrusted relevant fields with detailed tasks, urging them to get fully ready to cope with whatever development in the zone.

articles.title: White Paper Reveals Danger of US-S. Korea War Drills
articles.content:
White Paper Reveals Danger of US-S. Korea War Drills
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The National Reunification Institute Monday released a white paper revealing the gravity and danger of the war drills being held by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean regime to prove who is the provoker increasing the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula. 
					 The white paper said:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea have kept up staging war drills against the DPRK for six decades since the ceasefire. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers waged more than 18,000 north-targeted war drills and military trainings in south Korea since the ceasefire. It is the number that was officially made public. 
					
					 The Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills have been staged every year in south Korea, involving hundreds of thousands of troops including the U.S. aggression troops in south Korea, south Korean puppet army, U.S. forces from its mainland, Pacific region and Japan and even troops of its allies such as Britain, Australia, Colombia, Canada and Denmark. 
					
					 In particular, the war drill Ulji Freedom Guardian activated more than 400,000-500,000 troops including the U.S. aggression troops in south Korea, U.S. reinforcement troops, the three services of the south Korean puppet army, those concerned of the south Korean "government" institutions and local autonomous  bodies. 
					
					 This shows that the U.S. and south Korea mobilize huge forces enough to conduct a total war in the north-targeted war exercises. 
					
					 Also involved in the north-targeted war drills are latest war hardware and means. 
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea recently laid out a "plan to jointly cope with the provocation of a local war" the keynote of which is for the U.S. to automatically get involved in case of the military conflict between the north and the south and jointly counter it together with the south Korean puppet army. The on-going war drill against the north is just aimed to put the plan into practice.
					
					 The north-targeted war exercises staged by the U.S. together with the puppet army in south Korea are a heinous nuclear war rehearsal to bring a nuclear holocaust to the Korean Peninsula, Northeast Asia and other parts of the world.
					
					 Right after the cease-fire, the U.S. loudly spoke in public that "it suffered a defeat in the Korean War because it did not use A-bombs". It drew up all kinds of scenarios of nuclear war including 8-53 and the "9-day heavy strike strategy", which called for using nuclear weapons in case of the second Korean war, and has gone desperate in waging military drills according to the scenarios. 
					
					 The U.S. officially made public to the world in July 1957 that it started the work to arm the U.S. forces present in south Korea with nuclear weapons and massively introduced nuclear weapons including tactical nuclear missile Honest John and 280 mm atomic artillery pieces into south Korea to hurl them into Focus Lens, Focus Retina and other north-targeted war drills.
					
					 The U.S. nuclear war provocation against the DPRK has become evermore undisguised in the Team Spirit joint military drills which it staged together with the puppet army in the 1970s.
					
					 The drills involved F-16 fighter bomber, B-1B long-distance strategic bomber and nuclear submarines. There were even the drill of using atomic artillery pieces and the drill of launching Lens nuclear missile. 
					
					 In the early 1980s there took place in the underground operational room of the White House a mock exercise for commanding a nuclear war to strike all parts of the DPRK all at once in the presence of the U.S. president and over 1,000 nuclear warmongers.
					
					 The U.S. staged a drill for mount a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK after introducing the nuclear-powered aircraft carriers Enterprise and Midway into south Korea during the Team Spirit of 1983.
					
					 In 1985, it introduced the Blue Beret special unit armed with backpack nukes into south Korea to conduct evil drills of sabotaging the rear areas of the DPRK. From 1987 it activated the nuclear war-commanding plane to wage reckless war drills under various codenames to attack areas of the DPRK with nukes on the ground and seas and in the air.
					
					 In the RSOI in 1994 it rehearsed a nuclear war with the involvement of up-to-date strike means after drawing up such nuclear war scenarios as OPLAN 5026, OPLAN 5027, and the plan for bombing Nyongbyon that envisaged mounting a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					 In 2002 the U.S. worked out a "nuclear posture review" and a "national security strategy report" in which it put the DPRK on the list of preemptive nuclear attack. In March 2005 it advanced a "joint nuclear operational doctrine" and, pursuant to this, staged madcap drills for preemptive nuclear attack during RSOI, Foal Eagle, Ulji Focus Lens and other joint military exercises.
					
					 Since 2008 the U.S. has hurled all ultra-modern nuclear attack means including the largest-ever nuclear aircraft carrier and strategic bombers into Key Resolve, Foal Eagle and Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises.
					
					 B-2A flew into the sky above south Korea from the U.S. mainland for the first time in U.S. history to stage a mock drill for dropping nuclear bombs as part of Key Resolve and Foal Eagle.
					
					 John S. McCain and Decatur, Aegis destroyers carrying interceptor missiles, and SBX-1 were dispatched and two nuclear carrier flotillas were deployed in the waters off the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 As seen above, military drills being staged by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers under various codenames, claiming they are for "defensive" and "annual ones" are, to all intents and purposes, premeditated provocations to launch a war on the Korean Peninsula and nuclear war maneuvers to preempt a nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that they are the arch criminals escalating tensions on the Korean Peninsula and provocateurs, aggressors harassing peace and increasing the danger of war. -0-

articles.title: New DPRK Ambassador to India Appointed
articles.content:
New DPRK Ambassador to India Appointed
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Pak Kyong Son was appointed as new DPRK ambassador to India, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.

articles.title: Meeting Marks 20th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il as NDC Chairman
articles.content:
Meeting Marks 20th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il as NDC Chairman
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- There took place a national meeting at the April 25 House of Culture on Monday to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC).
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and dothers a chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, the Cabinet, social bodies, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media and Pyongyangites.
					
					 Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), made a report.
					
					 Pak said that it was a historical event of great significance in developing the DPRK and carrying out the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche that Kim Jong Il assumed the responsible post as chairman of the NDC as desired by all the service personnel and people of the DPRK and absolutely trusted by them.
					
					 The reporter noted that Kim Jong Il successfully solved all issues arising in the nation-building in the era of Songun with his rare wisdom and sagacious leadership, setting a true example in building a thriving socialist nation in the era of independence.
					
					 He built the state machinery with the NDC as a pivot as required by the changed reality and prevailing situation, thus providing the DPRK highly dignified with Songun with an ever-lasting bedrock for eternal prosperity, the reporter pointed out, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il wisely led the acute nuclear confrontation with the U.S. imperialists with his iron will and rare pluck. 
					
					 Under his leadership the DPRK succeeded in two underground nuclear tests, proudly ranking itself among nuclear weapons states.
					
					 He set forth an original and scientific idea on army building in the era of Songun and made endless long journeys for do-or-die Songun leadership, developing the People's Army into the most powerful revolutionary army in the world, the strong in ideology and faith.
					
					 He put the self-reliant defence industry on the firm basis of cutting-edge science and technology and turned the civilian defence forces into invincible ranks and the whole territory into an impregnable fortress.
					
					 He energetically led the work for arming the service personnel and people with the Juche idea and the Songun idea and bolstering up the driving force of the revolution with the KPA as a main force.
					
					 He regarded it as an important requirement for acquiring the status of a thriving nation to have access to satellites and carrier rockets and steered the drive for conquering space.
					
					 He unfolded a bright blueprint for building an economic power in the period when the country was undergoing the worst trial and saw to it that astonishing events took place one after another in the all-people advance for a great surge in the efforts to materialize it.
					
					 He provided the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, consistently pursuing the policy of national reunification based on the patriotic Songun politics for achieving national independence and thus brought about a radical change in the reunification movement advancing in the idea of "By our nation itself".
					
					 He conducted energetic external activities, always holding fast to the independent stand and revolutionary principle, remarkably raising the international prestige of the DPRK and making an immortal contribution to accomplishing the cause of independence against imperialism and the cause of socialism.
					
					 His idea of nation-building in the era of Songun and exploits performed by him in it are being successfully carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The DPRK will eternally grow stronger and prosper despite all sorts of tests of history under the outstanding and tested leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The service personnel and people should more powerfully demonstrate the spirit and national power of Songun Korea and bring about a turning point in the building of a thriving nation, single-mindedly united around the WPK, the reporter concluded.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un 
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Hassan Reza Husseini, military attache of the Iranian embassy here who is doyen of the corps, conveyed them to General of the Korean People's Army Kim Kyok Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, on Monday.
					
					 A congratulatory letter to Kim Jong Un was conveyed to an official concerned by the military attache of the Egyptian embassy here.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits Mangyongdae Revolutionary School
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits Mangyongdae Revolutionary School
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited Mangyongdae Revolutionary School on Monday on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 The members of the corps laid a floral basket before the statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at the school before paying tribute to them.
					
					 They looked round the room devoted to the education in the revolutionary history and various lecture rooms, being briefed on the undying exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu who worked heart and soul to the work for bringing up the children of revolutionary martyrs as successors to the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 At the end of the visit Hassan Reza Husseini, military attache of the Iranian embassy who is leading the attaches corps, made an entry at the visitors' book.

articles.title: 10-day Film Show Opens to Mark Day of Sun
articles.content:
10-day Film Show Opens to Mark Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A 10-day film show opened to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) with due ceremony at the Pyongyang International Cinema House Monday.
					 During the show, such documentaries as "Finding Himself among the People All His Life", "Fatherly Leader among Workers" and "Fatherly Leader among Children" dealing with the revolutionary history of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung will be screened at cinemas and cultural halls in Pyongyang and all other parts of the DPRK.
					
					 Cinema-goers will also watch feature films including "Star of Korea", "A Summer at Hwasong Uisuk School" and "The Land in Flames."
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, officials concerned, creators and artistes in the field of cinematic art and people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Hong Kwang Sun, minister of Culture, in an opening address said that the President embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years and dedicated his whole life to the country and its people, building on this land a socialist power, people's paradise.
					
					 The minister noted that the President is the eternal leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people and the sun of Juche as he laid a solid foundation for the triumphant advance of the revolutionary cause of Juche and its accomplishment.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, its participants watched a documentary "Our Leader Praised by All People."
					
					 Similar shows opened in all provinces on the same day.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet to Remember Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet to Remember Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- There took place in Nampho Port on Monday foreign crewmen's meeting to remember President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The participants placed bunches of flowers before the statue of the President in the city of Nampho before paying tribute to him.
					
					 The captain and crewmen of the Chinese-flagged ship Jin Pei were present at the meeting.
					
					 The speakers there said that the President was a distinguished thinker and theoretician who founded the Juche idea and an outstanding leader who turned the DPRK into a powerful socialist state.
					
					 He was an outstanding military strategist and ever-victorious iron-willed commander who defeated two imperialisms in one generation, they noted, and continued:
					
					 The Korean people have stood in confrontation with the U.S. imperialists despite their increasing nuclear war threat and pressure thanks to the powerful military force built by the President.
					
					 The idea and cause of the President have been successfully carried forward thanks to the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They hoped that the Korean people who are closely united around Kim Jong Un would register greater successes in their efforts for economic development and improving people's standard of living.
					
					 A letter to him was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: World Health Day Observed
articles.content:
World Health Day Observed 
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- An event took place at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Monday to mark the World Health Day. 
					 Present at the event were officials of social organizations, public health and media, the members of the WHO and the UNICEF missions, the delegations of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and the ICRC and the staff members of the foreign embassies here.
					
					 Speeches were made there. 
					
					 The participants in the event watched a video on hypertension and kinesi-therapy and looked round literature on preventing hypertension. 
					
					 Then they visited the Fitness Center in Thongil Street. 
					
					 Information service on hypertension took place in every province to mark the day.

articles.title: Cultivation of Medicinal Herbs in DPRK
articles.content:
Cultivation of Medicinal Herbs in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- April and May are months for cultivating medicinal herbs in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 In this regard, KCNA met Kim Mi Jong, an official at the Koryo Medicine Management Bureau under the Ministry of Public Health.
					
					 She said:
					
					 The government allocates yearly medical herb output quota to related entities in the country. 
					
					 All employees of the related field have now turned out in planting herbs.
					
					 Gathered in the spring season are such species of herbs as Atractylodes japonica, windflower, medicinal wormwood and celandine.
					
					 Meanwhile, peach, apricot and ginkgo nut stones are collected in cities and Artemisia messerschmidtiana, motherwort, barrenwort and dandelion in rural areas as Koryo medicinal materials in different seasons.
					
					 The medicinal herb harvest should be done in sites fixed by land management organs and the sites should be sown again.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Great Man with Noble Virtues
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Great Man with Noble Virtues
 Pyongyang, Aril 8 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung in his lifetime had shown deep loving care for Norodom Sihanouk, former great King of Cambodia.
					 He invited Sihanouk to Pyongyang on more than 40 occasions, meeting him for hundreds of times.
					
					 In April Juche 54 (1965) the President met him for the first time in the event to mark the Bandung Conference in Indonesia.
					
					 As Sihanouk was living in exile after being ousted from power during a military coup, the President invited him to Pyongyang and gave him warm welcome. During his stay in Pyongyang, Kim Il Sung frequently met and discussed with him the ways for tiding over his trials.
					
					 Sihanouk returned home after Cambodia won in the anti-U.S. national resistance. But soon, he exiled himself again after getting a cold reception from the ruling Cambodian forces.
					
					 At that time, too, Kim Il Sung gave a helping hand to him, pondering with him over the issue of retaking the legal position in Cambodia. He called Sihanouk his brother as he did before.
					
					 He told Sihanouk about the experiences gained in the DPRK in forming the united front, underscoring need to achieve unity among all forces loving the country and the nation.
					
					 At meetings with foreign dignitaries, he used to say that Cambodia was represented by Sihanouk and, therefore, Sihanouk was just Cambodia, stressing he always supported Sihanouk.
					
					 His invariable support for Sihanouk played an important role in clearing off predudice and misconceptions among many people towards him, leading to creation of international climate favourable to his patriotic activities.
					
					 Thereby, Sihanouk flew to Pyongyang first of all to express his heartfelt thanks to Kim Il Sung as head of state of Cambodia when an interim government was established in Cambodia.
					
					 Indeed, Kim Il Sung was an incarnation of internationalism, possessed of noble personality, great magnanimity and warm humanity.

articles.title: "Special Training" System Enforced by Japan in Korea
articles.content:
"Special Training" System Enforced by Japan in Korea
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- During their colonial rule of 40 odd years over Korea, the Japanese imperialists enforced a "special training" system upon the young Korean people allegedly to give them "professional education".
					 The system was in actuality aimed to nurture reserves of "draftees", "volunteers' corps" and "sexual slaves for the Japanese army".
					
					 On October 1, 1942, the Japanese Cabinet promulgated the "ordinance on special training of Korean youths" as decree No. 33 and "regulations on implementation" of this ordinance were announced on October 26 as "ordinance of Government-General in Korea" No. 269.
					
					 The Government-General in Korea gave an order to start the "special training" for uneducated young Koreans on December 1.
					
					 Thereby, nearly 2,700 "special training centers" were set up throughout the country until April 1, 1943, with more than 102,600 young people forcibly recruited.
					
					 The centers majored in education for transforming Koreans into imperial subjects, before drafting them as conscriptees of the imperial Japanese army.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists even recruited teenage girls to use them as "sexual slaves for the Japanese army." Tens of thousands of teenage girls were forced to receive Japanese-style moral and sexual education at the centers.
					
					 The "special training" system was a state-sponsored crime. But, Japan persists in denying the crime still now, far from making compensation for it.
					
					 Its denial has further fueled the Korean people's hatred against Japan. 
					
					 Japan should repent of its past crimes at an early date, mindful that it is an issue related to politics, morality and international law.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Turning Country into Socialist Fairyland
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Turning Country into Socialist Fairyland
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- All officials, party members and other people should work hard with patriotic devotion to spruce up their cities, villages, parks and pleasure grounds and manage them well  as required by the era of Songun, Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an editorial. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the determination of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un to turn the beautiful country to which Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il devoted all their lives into a splendid and highly civilized socialist fairyland and socialist land of bliss where the people's ideals becomes a reality and they enjoy happiness.
					
					 To spruce up the whole country including cities, villages, parks and pleasure grounds as a socialist fairyland is a striking demonstration of the dignity and might of Korean-style socialism. 
					
					 Now the world admires the revolutionary spirit of the service personnel and people of the DPRK pushing forward the building of an economic power and socialist civilized society, closely united around the party despite the tense situation where a war may break out right now. This is a miracle which can be performed only by them who have firm confidence in victory and strong will to carve out a rosy future. 
					
					 Patriotism starts from the yard of one's own house and it is fully manifested in taking good care of all the wealth of the country, big or small, like the apple of one's eye.
					
					 All officials, party members and other people should conduct a dynamic drive to turn the whole country into a socialist fairyland where Songun culture is blooming, cherishing the firm confidence in final victory and ardent patriotism.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bolstering Nation's Nuclear Deterrent
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bolstering Nation's Nuclear Deterrent
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- No matter how desperately the enemies may work, the DPRK will further bolster up its nuclear deterrent both in quality and quantity as it serves as a treasured sword of justice, peace and patriotism.
					 Rodong Sinmun on Monday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The nukes of the great Paektusan nation are a priceless asset common to all the Koreans, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 By having access to nukes the DPRK emerged a power which no one can ever provoke.
					
					 The DPRK is the country which the formidable imperialist enemy styling itself a dominator of the world dares not provoke, describing it as "the most fearful rival." Neither pressure nor sanctions of the imperialists can work on it. It is the great country whose dignity will remain shinning for all ages free from uneasiness about aggression and war.
					
					 Nukes, the treasured sword of the DPRK, serve as reliable war deterrent to beat back any foreign aggression and provide a sure guarantee for defending the sovereignty of the nation.
					
					 The powerful nuclear force guarantees the peace on the Korean Peninsula and the prosperity and happy life of the nation.
					
					 The nukes of the DPRK are what keep the nation alive as they can never be bartered for any wealth.
					
					 Countries in the Balkans and Mideast gave up even their existing war deterrent, yielding to the pressure and appeasement of the imperialists after failing to build up powerful capacities for self-defence, reading faces of big powers. Finally, these countries fell victim to their aggression. The deplorable plight of their peoples teaches the lesson that any retreat and concession in the issue related to the life of the nation precisely lead to submission, subjugation and self-destruction.
					
					 All Koreans now realize why the thrice-cursed mushroom-shaped clouds of a nuclear explosion have not appeared in the greatest hotspot in the world and how the nuclear deterrent of the DPRK for self-defence is protecting their destiny.
					
					 Unshakable is the will of the army and people of the DPRK to fight a final battle to defend the dignity and sovereignty of the nation and achieve the historic cause of national reunification by wiping out the aggressors and provokers to the last man by the tremendous nuclear power of the great Paektusan nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Hails WPK's New Strategic Line
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Hails WPK's New Strategic Line
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea's new strategic line on simultaneously carrying out economic construction and the building of nuclear force serves as a great revolutionary line to bring earlier the victory in the Juche cause of revolution started on Mt. Paektu as required by the prevailing situation and the developing revolution.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 It continues:
					
					 The party and state of the country are now faced with the important tasks to build the best country where all people live as well as others in the world, the people's paradise on this land. To this end, it is necessary to build powerful military force, nuclear force in particular. The necessity to do so is proved by history.
					
					 But for the DPRK's nuclear deterrent, the U.S. would have already unleashed a war on the Korean Peninsula. That would have been the most catastrophic nuclear war mankind has ever experienced.
					
					 This is the reason why the world appreciates the DPRK's nuclear deterrent as a reliable guarantee for peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 What is the most important for the DPRK in building a thriving nation while standing in confrontation with the U.S., the world's biggest possessor of nuclear weapons, is to bolster up its nuclear force both in quality and quantity.
					
					 The new line is a just one as it makes it possible for the DPRK to bolster up its nuclear force and safeguard the security of the country on the basis of the existing Juche-based nuclear industry and fully implement the plan and intention of the party to improve the standard of the people's living by channeling efforts into economic construction.
					
					 The new strategic line of the party is an option taken by it under the unavoidable circumstances to cope with the U.S. imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK by force of nukes.
					
					 The U.S. sanctions and moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK will become all the more pronounced as long as its hostile policy towards the DPRK remains unchanged. The DPRK's option to counter the U.S. with powerful nuclear deterrent is, therefore, entirely right.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces US for Introducing Nuclear War Hardware
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces US for Introducing Nuclear War Hardware
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist warmongers introduced nuclear submarine Cheyenne, B-52, B-2A and F-22 into south Korea under the pretext of the Foal Eagle joint military exercises. They also sent John S. McCain and Decatur, Aegis destroyers mounted with interceptor missile, and SBX-1 to the waters off the Korean Peninsula. A super-large nuclear carrier is supposed to move to the peninsula.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is little short of a declaration to ignite a nuclear war at any cost on this land, not just nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK and demonstration of armed forces. 
					
					 The military hardware being brought to south Korea are the state-of-the art preemptive offensive weapons on which the U.S. put big faith.
					
					 The DPRK-U.S. confrontation has nearly seven decades-long history. But the U.S. imperialists have never made such desperate efforts in the nuclear war moves against the DPRK by mobilizing all kinds of latest nuclear war equipment as now.
					
					 The clear intention sought by the U.S. is to turn the Korean Peninsula into an advance base for securing the military hegemony in Northeast Asia and carrying out its world domination strategy with its focus being shifted to the Asia-Pacific region with a top priority given to the region.
					
					 It is, indeed, a foolish act that the U.S. imperialists are moving to browbeat the DPRK by using sort of "sophisticated weapon".
					
					 If they finally start a nuclear war, the DPRK will set fire to the dens of crimes and bases of aggression with its powerful and sophisticated nuclear strike means and completely wipe them out on the earth.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group of traitors will not be of exception in the face of the DPRK's retaliatory strike for justice as they turned south Korea into the land for the U.S. latest weapons exhibition and nuclear test ground.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Reckless Remarks against DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Reckless Remarks against DPRK under Fire
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- As regards the new strategic line recently laid down by the Workers' Party of Korea, the chief Cabinet secretary of Japan let loose a spate of nonsense at a press conference that "north Korea continues making provocative remarks and actions and it is very regretful." Japanese Prime Minister Abe uttered that what is important is for the international community to keep enforcing the "UN resolutions" against it, remaining unfazed by "north Korea's provocative remarks." The Japanese defence minister talked the same jargon, grumbling that it was something unprecedented that the north Korean army specified geographical names of Japan as targets of its strike.
					 Rodong Sinmun on Monday obverses in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The Japanese authorities are talking this or that in a bid to shift the responsibility for the escalating tension on the Korean Peninsula on to the DPRK. This is nothing but a base ploy to protect their U.S. master.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries must know well that the U.S. is the arch criminal escalating the tension on the peninsula but they are making far-fetched assertions, blinded by their hostility toward the DPRK. This is a nasty behavior.
					
					 Had the Japanese authorities not been freed from the nightmare of nuclear disaster in the past, they should have taken the lead in protesting against the U.S. moves for a nuclear war. The Japanese reactionaries, however, seem pleased with the U.S. desperate efforts to ignite a nuclear war in Korea while persistently following a hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 We once again warn Japan against blindly toeing the U.S. policy. It will have to pay a dear price for its imprudent behavior.

articles.title: Large-scale Drills for Firepower Strike Planned in South Korea
articles.content:
Large-scale Drills for Firepower Strike Planned in South Korea
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The 8th corps of the south Korean puppet army is planning to stage a large-scale drill for firepower strike at the coast of Kangwon Province of south Korea on April 9 in coordinated operations with naval and air forces, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 It was reported that the drills would involve all type artillery pieces belonging to the corps, 9 destroyers of the navy and KF-16s and F-5s of the air force.
					
					 The warmongers are going to stage such drill with the maximum range under the simulated conditions of a real war.
					
					 They are intensifying the drills for preemptive strikes and stirring up the atmosphere of confrontation with the DPRK in a bid to stifle it at any cost.

articles.title: Halt to US Nuclear War Racket Called for
articles.content:
Halt to US Nuclear War Racket Called for
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany issued a joint statement on April 3 in support of the special statement of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK.
					 The statement said the special statement reflected the aspiration and will of the anti-war peace-loving people.
					
					 It vehemently denounced the U.S. for its moves to bring an unimaginable nuclear war disaster to mankind despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK.
					
					 It is an inhuman racket for the U.S. to keep introducing nuclear strike means into the Korean Peninsula, posing the biggest danger of war, it noted.
					
					 The U.S. is seriously mistaken if it thinks it can be safe in the future nuclear war, it said, urging the U.S. to stop at once the nuclear war racket, part of its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 It called for turning out in the struggle to prevent a war on the Korean Peninsula and defend the destiny of fellow countrymen and peace.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Homepage by British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Homepage by British Organization
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On the Juche Idea" was posted on the Internet homepage by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on Mar. 26.
					 The work, published on March 31, Juche 71(1982), deals with the undying historic feats President Kim Il Sung performed by founding the Juche idea and their significance, the origin of the Juche idea and its philosophical principle, socio-historical principles, guiding principles and historic significance.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Norway
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Norway
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for commemorating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated in Ostfold County, Norway on April 4.
					 Dag Norum, chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway, and Rita Berger, chief of the Ostfold Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, were elected co-chairpersons of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events praising the sacred revolutionary career and immortal exploits of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Anniversary of Russian Association for Friendship with DPRK Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Russian Association for Friendship with DPRK Marked
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Moscow on April 2 to mark the 20th anniversary of the inauguration of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK.
					 Present there were personages of the Russian Foreign Ministry and the association and masses.
					
					 Present there on invitation were officials of the DPRK embassy in Moscow.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 Victor Petrov, chairman of the association, referred to the background against which the association was formed 20 years ago and expressed his will to make sustained efforts to boost the friendly and cooperative relations between the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 Vice-Chairman Yuri Vanin said the association invariably supports the DPRK, expressing conviction that the Korean people would foil the hostile forces' moves for aggression and surely build a thriving nation under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 First Vice-Chairman Aleksandr Vorontsov said the West is floating misinformation that the DPRK is to blame for the tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 He added:
					
					The statements of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK are neither threat nor provocation against someone but warnings to the aggressors.
					
					 The plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea held on March, 2013 laid down a new strategic line on simultaneously pushing  forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 The statements and the line of the DPRK are just ones as they are to cope with the nuclear threat of the aggressors.
					
					  At the end of the meeting there were a performance given by Russian artistes and a reception.

articles.title: Statements of KPA Supreme Command Supported Abroad
articles.content:
Statements of KPA Supreme Command Supported Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Meetings, reading sessions and film shows took place in Nigeria and Benin on Mar. 27 and 28 in support of the statements of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					 The participants of the events were informed of the above-said statements.
					
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria and chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, made an address:
					
					 The U.S. prodded the UN Security Council into fabricating the "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK over its satellite launch and underground nuclear test in a bid to force the Korean people to yield to it.
					
					 Not content with staging large-scale war exercises with even nuclear strategic bombers involved, the south Korean warmongers try to desecrate even the statues of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il whom the Korean people profoundly revere.
					
					 The statements of the KPA Supreme Command and the DPRK Foreign Ministry are very just as they clarified the stand of the Korean people to defend their sovereignty.
					
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea who doubles as chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader", said:
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean military war-like forces should immediately halt their reckless war drills aimed to bring a nuclear disaster to the Korean people.
					
					 The U.S. should clearly know that nuclear weapons are no longer its monopoly.
					
					 Pascal Zouncheme, chairperson of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and rector of the Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin, said:
					
					 It is the legitimate right of the DPRK to launch a final battle to achieve the country's reunification. The army and people of the DPRK will victoriously conclude the showdown with the U.S. and the great war for national reunification single-mindedly united around Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Marshal Kim Jong Un. .
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched the Korean film "Arms of Korea."

articles.title: Egyptian Political Party Supports DPRK's Toughest Measures
articles.content:
Egyptian Political Party Supports DPRK's Toughest Measures
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The Arab Socialist Party of Egypt released a statement on Apr. 1 in connection with the fact that the U.S. is staging its nuclear war maneuvers under the simulated conditions of a real war.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula is so tense that a war may break out any moment. This is because the U.S. introduced into south Korea sophisticated military hardware including warships equipped with more than 100 A-bombs and B-2A Stealth strategic bombers and three services of its armed forces.
					
					 Such provocative acts to do harm to the Korean people's supreme dignity and infringe upon the DPRK's sovereignty and its right to existence compelled it to take toughest countermeasures of justice.
					
					 The Arab Socialist Party of Egypt extends full support and firm solidarity to the friendly Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their cause.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers should stop their reckless war racket at once.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people will win victory in their just struggle for the country's sovereignty and national reunification under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: British Organizations Support Korean People's Stand for National Reunification
articles.content:
British Organizations Support Korean People's Stand for National Reunification
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association in their joint statement on Mar. 30 supported the Korean people in their will to fight a just and great war for national reunification.
					 Very just was the DPRK when it declared that the north-south relations have been put at the state of war, the statement said, and continued:
					
					 The south Korean authorities have totally denied all the inter-Korean agreements, taking an active part in the Yankee U.S. imperialists' madcap war racket against the DPRK.
					
					 Moreover, they have made no scruple of pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war in collusion with the U.S. imperialists. This completely undermined the possibility of settling the issue in a peaceful manner through negotiations and dialogue.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their satellite forces passed the UN Security Council's "resolutions on sanctions" to bar the DPRK from its independent development and are kicking off even the joint military exercises.
					
					 They dared hatch a plot to bring down the statues of the great Generalissimos.
					
					 The south Korean authorities which were illegally formed by the U.S. imperialists at gunpoint are, in fact, a marionette for the U.S. and a puppet, fascist and corrupt "government".
					
					 The south Korean puppet group is running out of its days.
					
					 We fully support the Korean people's declaration of their will to wage a just and great war for national reunification and hope to see Korea reunified at an early date.

articles.title: US Urged Not to Meddle in Issue of Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
US Urged Not to Meddle in Issue of Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Bulgaria and Austria made public statements on Mar. 31 and Apr. 2 in denunciation of the moves of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to unleash a nuclear war.
					 The Communist Unity Movement of Bulgaria said:
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula has been increasingly deteriorated due to the moves of the U.S. and the south Korean regime to ignite a war against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are now waging joint military drills by mobilizing a large number of troops and war hardware.
					
					 Such acts are posing big danger to the global peace.
					
					 The U.S. should implement the resolution adopted at the 30th UN General Assembly session in 1975 which called for not meddling in the internal affairs of Korea.
					
					 We call on all progressive political parties and public organizations of the world to strongly condemn the U.S. for its moves for aggression against the DPRK and extend solidarity to the Korean people standing up against outside forces.
					
					 The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna said:
					
					 We accuse the U.S. of staging war drills on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. has reinforced its aggression forces, instead of making efforts for the detente on the peninsula.
					
					 South Korea is actively joining the U.S. in its war maneuvers.
					
					 Just like other countries, the DPRK has its obligation and right to defend its people's sovereignty and territory.
					
					 We demand the U.S. halt its moves to stifle the DPRK, not threatening the peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: UNSC Should Take Measures to Deter Aggressors from War Provocation
articles.content:
UNSC Should Take Measures to Deter Aggressors from War Provocation
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru issued a statement on Mar. 28 in denunciation of the war exercises for aggression by the U.S. imperialists and their followers to stifle the DPRK.
					 The world is closely following the situation on the Korean Peninsula, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists staged the large-scale joint military exercises from early in March with the huge armed forces involved including their troops, the south Korean puppet forces and their satellite forces.
					
					 Such bellicose military drills have now reached the phase of a real war with the open use of even nuclear strike means as well as WMDs in the sky, ground and seas.
					
					 The revolutionary strike armed forces of the DPRK have been put on the highest alert to cope with the aggressors' war maneuvers in accordance with the order issued by the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The DPRK Foreign Ministry also formally informed the UN Security Council that the Korean Peninsula is now in a touch-and-go situation due to the nuclear war provocation moves of the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 The DPRK has long made sincere efforts for the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula with its proposal calling for replacing the Korean Armistice Agreement with a peaceful treaty. However, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces have always refused to accept it, responding to it with their hostile moves against the DPRK and war rehearsals for aggression.
					
					 The People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru extends positive support and solidarity to all the measures taken by the DPRK to defend the country's supreme dignity and sovereignty and the Korean people who rose up as one in their anti-U.S. sacred war.
					
					 The U.S. and its satellite forces and the south Korean puppet forces should immediately stop their moves of enmity against the DPRK and war drills for aggression.
					
					 The UNSC should take steps to prevent the aggressors' moves to ignite a war.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreigners
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Reading sessions and seminars on Vol. 1 of Part 1 The Anti-Japanese Revolution of "With the Century", reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung, were held in Romania and Ethiopia between from Mar. 22 to 27 on the occasion of his birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun).
					 Praising Kim Il Sung as the great leader who dedicated himself to the country's prosperity and the people's happiness all his life, Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, said:
					
					 History does not know such an outstanding leader as Kim Il Sung who embarked on the road of revolution in his teens, founded the great Juche idea and led the Korean revolution to victory by standing up against the formidable imperialist enemies.
					
					 That is why the Korean people still uphold Kim Il Sung as the sun in high esteem and significantly celebrate his birth anniversary as the Day of the Sun.
					
					 I am sure that the heroic Korean people will surely win a victory in building a thriving socialist nation and in the anti-U.S. showdown as they are led by Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who has successfully carried forward the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Juche idea followers in Ethiopia praised the greatness of Kim Il Sung who founded the immortal Juche idea, performing the great exploits for the cause of national reunification and the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Kim Yang Gon declara medida importante sobre la Zona Industrial de Kaesong
articles.content:
Kim Yang Gon declara medida importante sobre la Zona Industrial de Kaesong
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- El secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Yang Gon, publico este lunes una declaracion que sigue:
					Hoy dia, la Peninsula Coreana vive las circunstancias de guerra debido a las brutales hostilidades y la campana de guerra nuclear de Estados Unidos y las autoridades surcoreanas contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					 En particular, insatisfechas de haber agravado la tension militar en complicidad de EE.UU., las fuerzas conservadoras del Sur de Corea hacen todo lo posible para convertir hasta la Zona Industrial de Kaesong (ZIK) en un escenario de enfrentamiento y buscar el pretexto de provocacion de la guerra de agresion al Norte de Corea.
					
					 A pesar de nuestras reiteradas advertencias, los fanaticos de enfrentamiento del Sur de Corea siguen pronunciando disparates intolerables, que manchan la dignidad de la RPDC, tales como la "fuente de ingreso", "caso de retencion" y "rehenes".
					
					  Para colmo, el ministro de Defensa Nacional surcoreano, Kim Kwan Jin, expuso hasta su siniestra intencion de introducir la unidad de comandos norteamericanos en la ZIK bajo el rotulo de la llamada operacion de "rescate de rehenes".
					
					  Esto demuestra que los belicistas surcoreanos enloquecidos por la guerra intentan convertir la ZIK en el foco de la guerra de agresion al Norte de Corea.
					
					  La ZIK se ha construido como simbolo de reconciliacion, cooperacion y reunificacion gracias a que la RPDC concedio prerrogativas a la parte del Grupo Hyundai del Sur de Corea apreciando el proposito patriotico pro-reunificacion de su presidente honorario Jong Ju Yong.
					
					 La RPDC concedio a las empresas surcoreanas una extensa y delicada zona a lo largo de la linea de demarcacion militar donde se enfrentan agudamente las fuerzas armadas de ambas partes coreanas.
					
					Eso fue una decision valiente basada en el ilimitado amor por la nacion y en la fraternidad y una expresion de la firme voluntad de lograr la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad segun el espiritu de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", refrendado en la historica Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio.
					
					 Aun durante el mandato del traidor Lee Myung Bak, fanatico de confrontacion fratricida que rompio todas las relaciones intercoreanas, la ZIK sobrevivio gracias al deseo y la voluntad sobre la reunificacion de todos los coreanos del Norte y el Sur y no se ha parado la operacion de ella en busca de la prosperidad comun.
					
					Pero, la ZIK atraviesa hoy dia una seria crisis.
					
					No se puede tolerar por mas tiempo que esa zona, criatura de la epoca del 15 de Junio, se convierta en un escenario de enfrentamiento fratricida y provocacion militar apartandose de su caracter y mision original, por culpa de los connotados elementos conflictivos como Kim Kwan Jin. 
					
					Las fuerzas conservadoras surcoreanas dicen que la RPDC no podra romper nunca la ZIK, hablando como si ella fuera beneficiaria de esa zona. Pero, nuestra parte no gana casi nada en sentido economico en esa zona y la parte Sur es la que realmente se beneficia mucho.
					
					En particular, hicimos la enorme concesion de ceder ese lugar estrategico desde el punto de vista militar. 
					
					Es una tragedia que la ZIK, que debe contribuir a la reconciliacion, la unidad, la paz y la reunificacion de la nacion, se malempleara como campo de confrontacion fratricida y provocacion de la guerra de agresion al Norte de Corea, y sera mejor que no exista una ZIK como esa.
					
					Dado que las autoridades surcoreanas pagan con enemistad la magnanimidad y fraternidad de nuestra parte, nos vemos obligados a tomar una decision importante al respecto.
					
					En relacion con que la ZIK se halla en crisis, declaro, bajo la autorizacion, la siguiente medida importante:
					
					1. Retiramos a todos nuestros empleados que trabajaban en la ZIK.
					
					2. Suspendemos temporalmente la operacion de la ZIK y revisaremos el problema de su existencia, ya que las autoridades y los belicistas del circulo militar del Sur de Corea tratan de convertir la zona en el punto candente de confrontacion fratricida y provocacion de la guerra de agresion al Norte manchando la dignidad de la RPDC y revisaremos su existencia o cierre.
					
					La Direccion Central de Desarrollo de las     Zonas Especiales estara a cargo de las gestiones relacionadas con la medida importante como la retirada de nuestros empleados y el paro temporal de la operacion de la ZIK.
					
					La posterior evolucion de la situacion depende enteramente de la actitud de las autoridades surcoreanas.

articles.title: Kim Yang Gon recorre la zona industrial de Kaesong
articles.content:
Kim Yang Gon recorre la zona industrial de Kaesong
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- Puesto que se torna serio el problema de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong (ZIK) debido a las hostilidades y la campana belica de Estados Unidos y las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Yang Gon, la visito el dia 8 para averiguar las gestiones en el terreno. 
					Le acompanaron los funcionarios interesados del Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria y la Direccion General de Orientacion Central de Desarrollo de la Zona Especial. 
					
					Kim recorrio la oficina de la Direccion General de Orientacion Central de Desarrollo de la Zona Especial en la ZIK, el centro de asistencia general de la ZIK y otras unidades y talleres de produccion en la zona, el puesto de control de transito y la linea divisoria central de las carreteras Norte-Sur en la linea de demarcacion militar.
					
					Dijo que el destino de la ZIK se encuentra en el estado critico debido a las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas que agravaron la situacion insultando la dignidad de la RPDC en el tema de la ZIK. 
					
					En cuanto al expuesto intento del ministro surcoreano de Defensa Nacional, Kim Kwan Jin, de introducir en la ZIK hasta los comandos norteamericanos bajo el rotulo de la llamada operacion de "rescate de rehenes", Kim Yang Gon lo califico de provocacion malintencionada para convertir la citada zona en el foco de guerra.
					
					Dado que llegan al climax las maniobras de EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos para desatar la guerra de agresion contra la RPDC, hay que elevar al maximo la vigilancia y mantenerse en el estado de alerta y movilizacion, apunto.
					
					Con respecto a que la ZIK no puede operar normalmente como consecuencia de la conducta imprudente de los belicistas titeres surcoreanos, Kim convoco en el terreno una reunion consultiva para buscar remedios y dio a la rama competente las tareas concretas de prepararse perfectamente para cualquier contingencia en la ZIK.

articles.title: IRP publica carta blanca sobre la peligrosidad de ejercicios de guerra EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
IRP publica carta blanca sobre la peligrosidad de ejercicios de guerra EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- El Instituto de la Reunificacion de la Patria (IRP) hizo publica el dia 8 una carta blanca para revelar la gravedad y peligrosidad de los ejercicios de guerra anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que libran los imperialistas norteamericanos y las autoridades surcoreanas y para aclarar al interior y exterior del pais quien es el provocador verdadero que acarrea el peligro de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana.
					Segun la nota, tales maniobras militares se realizaron sin parar durante 60 anos desde el armisticio de la pasada guerra coreana.
					
					Desde entonces para aca, los yanquis y los titeres surcoreanos realizaron en mas de 18 mil ocasiones en suelo surcoreano los ejercicios de guerra anti-RPDC y otros entrenamientos militares, senala la carta y prosigue:
					
					En los simulacros anuales "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle", se movilizan las tropas yanquis ocupantes del Sur de Corea y el ejercito titere surcoreano, centenares de miles de efectivos norteamericanos asentados en el territorio estadounidense, la region del Pacifico y en Japon. Se incorporan ademas los efectivos de los paises satelites como Gran Bretana, Australia, Colombia, Canada y Dinamarca.
					
					En "Ulji Freedom Guardian" toman parte mas de 400 mil o 500 mil incluyendo las tropas yanquis ocupantes del Sur de Corea y las fuerzas de refuerzo, las fuerzas terrestres, aereas y navales del ejercito surcoreano y los relacionados de las instituciones gubernamentales y entidades autonomas locales del Sur de Corea.
					
					Esta realidad testimonia que EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos movilizan en los ejercicios de guerra de agresion al Norte de Corea colosales fuerzas armadas con que les bastaria para ejecutar una guerra entera.
					
					Tambien se movilizan generalmente los ultramodernos equipos y medios de guerra.
					
					Hace poco, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos fabricaron el llamado "plan de operaciones conjuntas para hacer frente a la provocacion local", segun el cual EE.UU. intervendra automaticamente en el eventual conflicto armado entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					En el marco de los corrientes ejercicios militares, se realiza el entrenamiento para ponerlo en practica.
					
					Las maniobras conjuntas EE.UU.-Sur de Corea se encaminan a imponer los desastres de guerra nuclear a la Peninsula Coreana, el Nordeste Asiatico y a todo el mundo.
					
					Poco despues del armisticio de Corea, EE.UU. dijo abiertamente que "sufrio la derrota en la guerra coreana porque no habia usado bombas atomicas" y trazo los guiones de guerra nuclear,  incluyendo "8-53" y la "estrategia de ataque intensivo a corto plazo de 9 dias", que supone el uso de arma nuclear en caso de la segunda guerra coreana. 
					
					  Tras declarar oficialmente en julio de 1957 que procederia al armamento nuclear de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea, EE.UU. envio en gran escala al territorio surcoreano las armas nucleares como misiles nucleares tacticos Honest John, canones atomicos de 280 mm de calibre, etc. que se usaron en las maniobras "Focus Lens" y "Focus Retina" y otros ejercicios de guerra anti-RPDC.
					
					  En la decada de 1970, se tornaron mas abiertas las tentativas de EE.UU. de provocar la guerra nuclear anti-RPDC a traves de los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Team Spirit".
					
					  En esa ocasion, participaron el cazabombardero F-16, el otro estrategico de largo alcance B-1B y el submarino nuclear y se realizo el entrenamiento de disparo de canones atomicos y de lanzamiento de misil nuclear Lens.
					
					A principios de la decada de 1980, en la sala subterranea de operaciones de la Casa Blanca se realizo el entrenamiento de mando de la guerra nuclear sobre el mapa, que supuso el ataque simultaneo a toda la zona del Norte de Corea, con la participacion del presidente norteamericano y mas de mil maniacos de guerra nuclear.
					
					Durante los ejercicios "Team Spirit" de 1983, tuvo lugar el entrenamiento de ataque preventivo nuclear con la movilizacion de los portaaviones nucleares Enterprise y Midway. 
					
					En 1985, llegaron al Sur de Corea los comandos Boinas Verdes, equipados de mochilas nucleares, para ejercitar el sabotaje de  la retaguardia de la RPDC. Desde 1987, un avion de mando de guerra nuclear esta dirigiendo diversos ejercicios de ataque nuclear contra las zonas norcoreanas.
					
					En los "ejercicios combinados de refuerzo en tiempo de guerra", efectuados desde 1994, se trazaron los guiones de guerra nuclear como "OPLAN 5026", "OPLAN 5027" y el "plan de bombardeo a Nyongbyon" y se movilizaron distintos medios de ataque nuclear sofisticados.
					
					EE.UU. elaboro en 2002 el "informe de revision del estado nuclear" y el "otro de la estrategia de seguridad nacional" incluyendo a la RPDC en la lista de blancos de ataque preventivo nuclear. En marzo de 2005, presento la llamada "doctrina de operacion nuclear conjunta", segun la cual se llevaron a cabo los simulacros de ataque preventivo nuclear, tales como "ejercicios combinados de refuerzo en tiempo de guerra", "Foal Eagle" y "Ulji Focus Lens".
					
					Desde 2008, en las maniobras "Key Resolve", "Foal Eagle" y "Ulji Freedom Guardian" participaron superportaaviones de propulsion nuclear, bombarderos estrategicos y otros armamentos nucleares sofisticados de EE.UU.
					
					En la ultima edicion de "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle", se traslado por primera vez al firmamento surcoreano el bombardero estrategico Stealth B-2A desde el territorio estadounidense y ejecuto el simulacro de lanzamiento de bombas atomicas.
					
					Y se despacharon con urgencia a las aguas cercanas a la Peninsula Coreana los destructores Aegis equipados con misiles interceptores, John S. McCain y Decatur, la plataforma maritima autopropulsada SBX-1 con radares anticoheteriles y 2 flotillas de portaaviones nucleares 
					
					Los simulacros de toda clase, que los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos desarrollan bajo el vistoso rotulo de "defensa" y "anualidad", constituyen la provocacion premeditada para desatar la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, especificamente, atacar preventivamente con armas nucleares a la RPDC.
					
					Los hechos delatan que EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos son los que agravan la tension de la Peninsula Coreana destruyendo la paz y trayendo el peligro de guerra.

articles.title: Nombrado nuevo embajador de RPDC en la India

Nombrado nuevo embajador de RPDC en la India
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- Segun el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Kyong Son fue nombrado como nuevo embajador plenipotenciario y extraordinario de la RPDC a acreditarse en la India.

articles.title: Acto central por 20o aniversario de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Presidente de CDN de RPDC
articles.content:
Acto central por 20o aniversario de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Presidente de CDN de RPDC
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este lunes en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 20o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					Asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, etc., el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, el Consejo de Ministros, las entidades sociales, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de las ramas de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion y trabajadores. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros.
					
					El informante dijo que la eleccion del Dirigente como Presidente del CDN, segun la unanime aspiracion y absoluta confianza del ejercito y pueblo coreanos, fue un acontecimiento historico de gran significacion en el fortalecimiento de la RPDC y en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Songun del Juche. 
					
					Con la extraordinaria inteligencia y la sabia direccion, el Dirigente resolvio satisfactoriamente todos los problemas que se presentaban en la construccion del Estado de la era del Songun y creo el modelo de la construccion de la potencia socialista de la epoca de la independencia, recordo y continuo:
					
					El Dirigente establecio el sistema de estructura estatal centrado en el Comite de Defensa Nacional de acuerdo con la demanda de la realidad cambiada y la situacion creada, de modo que asento la base de eterna duracion para la prosperidad de la RPDC que exalta su poderio con el Songun. 
					
					Con la ferrea voluntad de acero y la audacia sin igual condujo sabiamente la aguda  confrontacion nuclear con el imperialismo norteamericano. 
					
					Bajo la guia del Dirigente, se realizaron con exito las dos pruebas nucleares subterraneas y se ha convertido la RPDC en el pais con armas nucleares. 
					
					Al presentar la original y cientifica idea en materia de construccion del ejercito en la era del Songun, formo el Ejercito Popular de Corea como invencible ejercito revolucionario fuerte en la ideologia y la conviccion estando en el incesante camino del Songun con la decision de vida o muerte. 
					
					Desarrollo la industria de defensa nacional independiente a base de la ciencia y tecnica de punta y convirtio las fuerzas armadas civiles en el invencible destacamento de combate, y todo el pais en la fortaleza inexpugnable. 
					
					Armo con firmeza a todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los habitantes con la idea Juche, la del Songun, y dirigio con energia la labor para fortalecer los sujetos de la revolucion tomando el EPC como grueso.
					
					Condujo al frente la campana para la conquista del cosmos considerando la posesion de satelite y de cohetes transportadores como clave para disponer de la fisonomia del Estado prospero. 
					
					En el periodo mas dificil de la patria, abrio la radiante perspectiva de la construccion de la potencia economica e hizo registrarse de modo escalonado los eventos asombrosos en la marcha de gran auge de todo el pueblo para el respecto. 
					
					Manteniendo invariablemente la politica de reunificacion de la patria basada en la politica de Songun caracterizada por la independencia nacional y el patriotismo, preparo la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y abrio la coyuntura de viraje del movimiento de reunificacion de la patria que avanza bajo el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales". 
					
					Desarrollo energicas actividades exteriores con el firme espiritu independiente y los principios revolucionarios. De esta manera, elevo extraordinariamente la autoridad exterior de la RPDC e hizo gran aporte al cumplimiento de la causa de independencia antiimperialista y la socialista. 
					
					La idea y las proezas del Dirigente en materia de la construccion del Estado de la era del Songun se llevan adelante por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Bajo la destacada y probada direccion del Mariscal, la RPDC lograra siempre la prosperidad superando todas las pruebas de la historia. 
					
					Hoy dia, todos los militares y civiles de RPDC tienen la tarea de desplegar plenamente el temperamento y el poderio estatal de la Corea del Songun uniendose monoliticamente en torno al PTC y abrir la coyuntura de viraje de la construccion de un Estado prospero.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia a autoridades japonesas por su obediencia a EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia a autoridades japonesas por su obediencia a EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- En cuanto a la nueva linea estrategica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el director del secretariado del gabinete japones dijo en una reciente conferencia de prensa que "es muy lamentable el incesante proceder provocativo". 
					El premier Abe insistio en que lo mas importante es que la sociedad internacional cumpla la "resolucion de la ONU" sin hacer caso de las "palabras provocativas del Norte de Corea". Entretanto, el ministro de Defensa tambien lo imito diciendo que el Ejercito Popular de Corea fijo concretamente por primera vez las localidades japonesas como blanco de ataque. 
					
					Las autoridades japonesas intentan imputar a la RPDC la responsabilidad por la grave situacion actual de la Peninsula Coreana, a sabiendas que el culpable del caso es EE.UU.
					
					Revela el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este lunes y continua: 
					
					Si los reaccionarios japoneses se hubieran  despertado de la pesadilla nuclear deberian oponerse al frente a las maniobras de guerra nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					Pero muy complacidos discretamente de que EE.UU. se entrega a desatar la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana, los reaccionarios japoneses recurren con mas frenesi a la politica hostil anti-RPDC. 
					
					Volvemos a advertir a Japon que pagara muy caro por su obediencia a ciegas a EE.UU.
